mean_cn: adj. 有毒的，恶毒的，分泌毒液的，怨恨的
mean_en: capable of putting poison or venom into another animal's body usually by biting or stinging it
word_etyma: venom 恶意+ ous ...的 → adj. 有毒的；恶毒的；分泌毒液的；怨恨的
sentence: I can't tell if a snake is venomous or not, so I avoid all of them.
sentence_trans: 我不能分辨一条蛇是否有毒，所以我会避开所有的蛇。
